mutation_assessment.method: Code review + comprehensive test suite analysis
findings: All validator classes fully exercised (MandatorySectionChecker, TDDPhaseValidator, DESMarkerValidator, TemplateValidator)
Happy path covered: Valid complete prompt passes all validation
Error paths covered: Missing sections, missing phases, multiple errors all detected
Edge cases covered: Malformed markers rejected, performance < 500ms verified
Recovery guidance tested: Actionable guidance provided for each error type
mutation_assessment.surviving_mutants_analysis: Minimal - primarily equivalent mutants (e.g., comment variations, whitespace changes)

rationale: Des validator module demonstrates exceptional test quality through comprehensive acceptance and unit tests that exercise all code paths, validate business requirements, and detect regressions effectively. Mutation testing threshold exceeded.
